textAfterTable: Am learning a lot Union's professors are top-notch. Almost all of them are active in their field; different professors are constantly churning out books and speaking at conferences. In fact, many of the professors came to Union from teaching at a grad school or seminary. The curriculum is distinctly oriented on the liberal arts and rooted in a conservative biblical tradition. Other Christian schools have abandoned their conservative heritage, but the liberals on faculty at Union are few and far between. The class sizes range from 2 to the 20s; even the core classes have no more than 20-something students. Most professors genuinely care about the students' learning and gear their classes accordingly.
